trans-unit.target: 由你操控且其上有指示物的生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·346 | Tesak, Judith's Hellhound | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Whenever Tesak, Judith's Hellhound attacks, add {R} for each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当裘蒂丝的地狱犬特煞攻击时，每有一个进行攻击的生物，便加{R}。

trans-unit.source: Experiment Twelve

trans-unit.resname: MKC·347 | Experiment Twelve | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample

trans-unit.resname: MKC·347 | Experiment Twelve | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Experiment Twelve or another creature you control is turned face up, put +1/+1 counters on that creature equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 每当十二号实验体或另一个由你操控的生物翻回正面时，在该生物上放置若干+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于其力量。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·347 | Experiment Twelve | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Disguise {4}{G}
Innocuous Researcher

trans-unit.resname: MKC·348 | Innocuous Researcher | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Parley — Whenever Innocuous Researcher attacks, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you investigate. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每当无害研究员攻击时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便探查一次。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·348 | Innocuous Researcher | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may untap all lands you control. If you do, you can't cast spells until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以重置所有由你操控的地。若你如此作，则直到你的下一个回合，你不能施放咒语。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: On the Trail

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·349 | On the Trail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Where the victim's journey ends, the investigator's begins.
trans-unit.target: 被害人的旅途终点，便是探员的事务起点。

trans-unit.source: Printlifter Ooze

trans-unit.resname: MKC·350 | Printlifter Ooze | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch

trans-unit.resname: MKC·350 | Printlifter Ooze | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Printlifter Ooze or another creature you control is turned face up, create a 0/0 green Ooze creature token with trample. The token enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当模印泥浆或另一个由你操控的生物翻回正面时，派出一个0/0，具践踏异能的绿色流浆衍生生物。该衍生物进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为由你操控的其他生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·350 | Printlifter Ooze | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Disguise {3}{G}
Counterpoint
Counter target spell. You may cast a creature, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker spell from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to that spell's mana value without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个法术力值等于或小于该咒语的生物，瞬间，法术或鹏洛客咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "Nice theory, but I'm going to have to poke some holes in it."
trans-unit.target: 「想法不错，但我得在上面戳几个洞。」

trans-unit.resname: MKC·352 | Knowledge Is Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Knowledge Is Power

trans-unit.resname: MKC·352 | Knowledge Is Power | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+X/+X，X为你本回合已抓的牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·352 | Knowledge Is Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tremble, criminal, before the overwhelming might of meticulously organized evidence!"
trans-unit.target: 「在事无巨细认真整理之充分证据带来的巨量震撼面前颤抖吧，罪犯！」

trans-unit.resname: MKC·353 | Take the Bait | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Take the Bait

trans-unit.resname: MKC·353 | Take the Bait | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during an opponent's turn and only during combat.
trans-unit.target: 只能于对手的回合中施放此咒语，且仅限战斗中。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·353 | Take the Bait | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn. Untap all attacking creatures and goad them. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将对你和由你操控之鹏洛客造成的所有战斗伤害。重置所有进行攻击的生物并煽惑它们。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.source: Panoptic Projektor

trans-unit.resname: MKC·354 | Panoptic Projektor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: The next face-down creature spell you cast this turn costs {3} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: {tap}：你本回合中施放之下一个牌面朝下的生物咒语减少{3}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MKC·354 | Panoptic Projektor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If turning a face-down permanent face up causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控之永久物具有的触发式异能因牌面朝下的永久物翻回正面而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.source: It displays every fact, every suspect, and every scrap of evidence for every case the Agency oversees.
trans-unit.target: 魔调局负责的每桩案子里的每处实情、每名嫌犯和每条证据都显现其上。
